backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining task, chore, calendar, cooking assignment, and profile types with access‑controlled CRUD operations and in‑memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files to two actor‑readiness UI fixes with associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, hooks, and utilities for tasks, profiles, recurring chores, and actor readiness.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme OKLCH color variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, loading states, and rendering header, TodayFocus, tabbed views, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AddTaskDialog.ts: Dialog for creating tasks with actor‑readiness checks, voice dictation, validation, and task submission logic.
frontend/src/components/CalendarDayPlann: Day planner showing tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores for a date with navigation and task completion toggling.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Main calendar view managing month/week/day modes, loading data, and mapping tasks, assignments, and chores to dates.
frontend/src/components/CalendarWeekPlan: Displays a weekly planner with tasks, cooking assignments, and chores, including navigation and task completion toggling.
frontend/src/components/DinnerRota.tsx: Handles weekly cooking assignments with editing dialogs, profile selection, fairness metrics, and voice dictation for meal descriptions.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing task details, including assignee, due date, and voice dictation for name and description.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with app title and authenticated user menu including logout.
frontend/src/components/HeroHeader.tsx: Reusable hero-style header component with background image and optional title/subtitle overlay.
frontend/src/components/LightweightMonth: Renders a lightweight calendar month view with task, cooking assignment, and recurring‑chore indicators and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Shows a login page with branding and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/People.tsx: Manages viewing, adding, editing, and deleting person profiles with color tags and principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/PersonBadge.tsx: Displays a small badge with an optional color dot and customizable size and variant.
frontend/src/components/PersonProfileSel: Provides a UI for selecting a person profile or manually entering a principal ID, with optional 'assign to me' button.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresD: Full dialog for creating, editing, pausing, and deleting recurring chores with voice dictation support and validation.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresI: Inline dashboard section listing grouped recurring chores with expand/collapse and manage button.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Displays and manages household tasks with grouping, editing, completion toggling, deletion, and recurring chores handling.
frontend/src/components/TodayFocus.tsx: Shows tasks due today and today's cooking assignment with loading states and simple task item rendering.
frontend/src/components/VoiceDictationBu: Provides a microphone toggle button with tooltip messaging, disabled handling, and a visual listening indicator.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithReadiness: Wraps useActor to expose readiness and initialization state for safely gating backend mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and loads stored identities using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePeopleProfilesQuer: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, updating, and deleting person profiles with actor readiness checks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating tasks and related backend data, with actor readiness checks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeedSampleData.ts: Empty placeholder file for a future sample data seeding hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: React hook that syncs state to sessionStorage with safe JSON handling and functional updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceDictation.ts: Hook implementing browser speech recognition with diagnostics, error handling, and transcript callbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup and CSS variables defining light and dark theme design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap wiring React, Internet Identity, React Query, and global styles.
frontend/src/types/webSpeech.d.ts: Ambient TypeScript definitions for the Web Speech API’s SpeechRecognition interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/actorAvailability.ts: Utilities to interpret and guard backend actor readiness with user-friendly messages.
Helpers for formatting and logging actor initialization diagnostics and errors.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Simple utilities for encoding optional Candid values without breaking serialization.
frontend/src/utils/cookingAssignmentLabe: Functions to compute display labels and colors for cooking assignments using profiles and principals.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Structured diagnostic logger for deployment and initialization steps with timing, errors, and guidance.
frontend/src/utils/fairness.ts: Computes cooking assignment fairness metrics over various date ranges and returns counts, colors, and period metadata.
frontend/src/utils/personProfiles.ts: Resolves principals to display labels and colors using person profiles, with fallbacks to shortened principal strings.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Provides safe parsing and validation utilities for principals, returning structured success/error results.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreDiagnos: Logs structured diagnostic information for recurring chore mutations, including payloads and outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreMutatio: Normalizes backend errors for recurring chore operations into user-facing messages and diagnostic details.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresPrevie: Formats and groups recurring chores by weekday, provides timeline labels, and retrieves upcoming chores.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresSchedu: Determines which recurring chores appear on specific dates based on timeline rules and filters by date.
frontend/src/utils/taskDayKey.ts: Converts dates and due timestamps into normalized yyyy-MM-dd day keys, including today's key.
frontend/src/utils/taskDueDayGrouping.ts: Groups tasks by normalized due date into sorted day groups with a final group for undated tasks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/voiceDictationDiagnos: Defines logging utilities for voice dictation events and environment diagnostics without exposing transcript data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended color tokens, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Represents the project’s current state, known issues, and existing feature fixes related to the Add Task button readiness logic.
